file_content.text: Maybe I'll try for an officer's commission. Somewhere warm.
Can't believe I made it.
Just stuff them on top, quick! If the pirates see this stuff, we'll never get our cut!
We'll--oh. Jedi. This... it's not what it looks like.
All right, explain. I'm listening.
This should be good.
Well the... the scavengers have... look! I had no choice!
I gave you a second chance, and you repay me with betrayal?
You've turned traitor.
I'm not betraying anyone! I just want to survive!
It looks like you're working with Valon and his men.
I'd say it looks bad for you.
You don't get it. I'm not a bad guy!
We're dying by the day, and Valon just keeps going! Valon promised us: Lead his men here, we stay alive!
Alive? Shameful life is none at all, soft thing.
Oh, Private. You honestly think Valon will honor your little deal?
Not for long.
Who's gonna stop Valon? You? You don't have the backbone--you couldn't even give me punishment duty!
If you have insight into Valon's plans, it could save you and your comrades.
Redeem yourself. Help me.
No! You keep fighting him, you're gonna get us all killed!
Have faith in me. And once Valon is gone, you get to go home.
Valon will fall. I swear.
Nobody's going home! Don't you get it?
I'm about to correct that mistake.
I'll rectify that. [Attack.]
I've been saving this knockout gas for a good cause. If I have to fight, I'd rather take someone who can die!
Those pirates made a real mess.
Keep packing everything, quick!
The LT doesn't have what it takes.
I know I screwed up, but... have you seen the ice on those comm aerials?
You lied to us! You and the LT!
We're all gonna die out here.
Lousy planet. Just white, wherever you look.
